name: Box Head Raids A Bank
description:
This is a short game I made in 3 hours for the Tri Jam #170

The theme was "Life In A Box", so I made a game about a goblin who lives their life in a box. This goblin just happens to be robbing a high-security facility.

Music: https://hrant.bandcamp.com/track/rain-theme-2

I used some scripts I had already made, as well as the music seen above as premade assets.

Use WASD or Arrow keys to move, use Down when not moving to turn into a box and avoid security.

Made with love <3
